operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO file_parts (creator_user_id, file_id, file_part, is_big_file, file_total_parts, bytes) VALUES (:creator_user_id, :file_id, :file_part, :is_big_file, :file_total_parts, :bytes)

operation.name: SelectFileParts
operation.sql: SELECT creator_user_id, file_id, file_part, is_big_file, file_total_parts, bytes FROM file_parts WHERE creator_user_id = :creator_user_id AND file_id = :file_id ORDER by file_part
